mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post(title, content, member_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{member_id})
mapper.select: SELECT p.id AS postId, m.nickname, p.title, p.content, p.views, p.created_at, p.modified_at, p.member_id, CASE WHEN p.created_at != p.modified_at THEN true ELSE false END AS isEdited FROM post p JOIN member m ON p.member_id = m.id WHERE p.id = #{id}
SELECT p.id AS postId, p.title, m.nickname, p.views, p.created_at, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comments c WHERE c.post_id = p.id) AS commentCount FROM post p JOIN member m ON p.member_id = m.id
